Also has a sleep mode so it is in energy saving mode when not being sent a task or printing, and the display is not constantly on, very cool. Small footprint on my desk which is also nice. I have used it under 20 times so far, so not a lot, but i haven't had a single issue with it.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner

Pros: Easy wireless setup, small footprint, quick drying ink, true colors.
Cons: Could be a little cheaper
Just picked up this Epson NX430 and I am pleasantly surprised. For such a basic printer, it comes with many functions. My favorite part was how easy the wireless setup was to do for a PC & a Mac, even with OSX 10 it was a breeze. I am happy with the small footprint and performance of this machine. I've had an HP and a Lexmark before but they didn't last nearly as long as I hoped for. Also, the quick drying ink in the Epson was amazing. You can use a highlighter over the text right away! As far as spitting out a ton of documents, this thing is no work horse, but for an occasional print it is excellent. I have yet to test the photo quality but I'm sure it will be up to ... par. Way to go Epson, you've earned my respect! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great for light or occasional use, very compact!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy setup, compact, easy operation, decent output, makes pdfs of scans.
Cons: Drinks ink like a drunken sailor, not very fast or as quiet as you'd hope.
This is actually a pretty neat printer/scanner/copier/fax for that small startup home office with light use or for a student. Smartly, the gravity paper feed on the back, when you remove the paper, has a dust cover that flips over the opening. This is such an obvious feature it's amazing more companies have not done this consistently.
The front panel folds in flat against the machine and pops out to a decent legible angle when you want to operate it from above, though you can leave it folded in and operate the machine facing it on a higher shelf.
The scanner is not fast, but works pretty well, especially ... for an inexpensive AIO. The lid is actually heavy enough to help flatten wrinkly newsprint or press a book down a little, but is on a liftable hinge so you can fit something of some thickness under it, making it possible to scan small objects for, say, online auctions.
Print speed is not going to wow anyone, but even with general duty plain paper, it never jammed, even with sheets i was reusing to print the backside (like a startup home office might at first).
I must say, the supplied ink cartridges are billed as being introductory, and they have very little ink in them. Literally a snap to load them, you put them (4 carts) into the color coded slots. Easy as pie. The machine tells you what to do and in what order on the little control panel display.
Printing photos is okay. uses beaucoups ink, but the colors were pretty okay and the detail was good. Text/document printing is crisp and not smeary (to the naked eye) on plain paper.
There is a quiet mode. I tried it. It's not that much quieter, though the machine is not very noisy to start with, surprising for such a small machine, but I think it's achieved by keeping speeds slow.
There is a memory card reader for printing directly from that, if you wish. The unit can be operated via Wifi (it wants to see a router to be connected to your computerS) and by a USB cable (not included). Wifi setup was easy, as it h ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner

I bought this printer for the main purpose of printing from my iPhone and iPad. However, when I set it up and tried to print a photo fom my iPhone or computer, the photo prints came out very dark. What I did not realize and what the manual should have said, is you must use photo paper and not plain paper when printing photos. As soon as I put in photo paper, the photos came out great. Use plain paper for everything else,but use photo paper for photos. Good luck...

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Extremely slow to print and software issues
Item.Review:
Pros: Beautiful photograph printing. Cheap.
Cons: Extremely slow printing and major software issues. Not worth the hassle.
I run a Windows 7 64-bit desktop computer. I was looking for a basic printer with a small footprint as I have very limited desk space. I have a document scanner so was not looking for an all-in-one, but hard to find small dedicated printers without paying more for the convienance of a 'portable' printer. The size and the internal paper tray appealed to me along with the price. I was thinking I could keep my document scanner on top of this unit. I have a Nikon CoolScan film scanner that I run with VueScan software that worked fine unitl I installed the printer software. VueScan stopped seeing the film scanner. I also started receiving messages on poweri ... ng up the computer that it had lost network connections and drives. I removed and reinstalled the software several times. I was not able to find this issue addressed from anyone else. I even tried just installing the print drive only. We had the same issues with our laptops, one Win7 64 bit and one WinVista 32 bit. Had to restore all the computers to the point before the Epson software was installed to solve the software issues. Printing was another issue, though it seemed to be a problem with my desktop computer only #USB connection#. It would take 5 or more minutes before it would start printing a simple doclument. Not exagerating. It would also stop and start during the printing and took several minutes to print one page. Again, removing and reinstalling the software did not help. The only positive thing I can say is that I did print a few pictures for my mother-in-law and they were a beautiful print job. I would have returned the unit except that I no longer had all of the original packaging and it wasn't worth the hassle. I pawned it off on someone else who does not do any scanning. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Not too bad, but laser is better in the long run
Item.Review:
Pros: Versatile, wireless, Google cloud-print ready, price is right
Cons: No sheet-fed scanner
This printer is light, compact, and doesn't waste room with the paper tray sticking out several inches (like the old inkjet printers used to). I was able to join it to my wireless network using one-touch wi-fi setup (if you have a button on your router with the sync arrows, then you can do the same). The touchscreen was responsive and snappy without attracting a lot of unsightly fingerprints-- and the menus are simple to navigate.
If they had used the top-loading paper tray as a sheet-feeder for the scanner, this would've been the best all-in-one on the market....Unfortunately, you're stuck with the one-sheet-at-a-time flatbed scanner. Scan quality was great-- you can scan to ... either PDF or JPG, but it won't let you append documents when scanning, so if you're scanning a long document, you'll have to merge each page together in a single file afterwards. (the Fujitsu ScanSnap is a great alternative if you're more interested in a sheetfed scanner)
The card reader feature is a nice touch, but probably won't get much use. I LOVE that I'm able to print from my iPod, iPad, Android, Mac, and PC. I have a networked Brother laser printer, and two shared HP printers-- and I'm always running into inter-device compatibility issues so the Epson was a welcome addition and upgrade to my existing all-in-one. The Epson NX430 is Google cloud-print ready, and I was able to go directly to the printer's ip address to enable the setting. (most routers have an ip address of 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.0.1-- from there you'll find your printer's address in the connected devices list). Google cloud-print isn't as versatile as I'd hoped for, but that's a Google issue-- not Epson's.
Replacing the ink cartridges will run you $55+. Inkjet printers are notoriously high ink users, so the cost will add up if you print a lot. If you do a lot of printing, I would recommend making the investment in a color-laser printer. For a few hundred bucks, you can get a color-laser, networked printer that'll give ... expand » « collapse

But the looks, ease of set up, size, and features got it to the 4 stars, now the performance has to earn that 5th star. Got this particular printer because it was compact and it was an Epson.....good quality. Was going for another Epson Artasin, model 837(I have an 835) for my wife. She wanted a small one for her limted computer area. So I returned the 837 and liked the looks and size of the NX430. I had Espon printers before and I enjoyed the way they have operated in the past. Very relieable. A plus is the printer is nice to look at as well! The price is really good for what ... you get...scan, copy, fax, WIFI ready. Good job Epson, keep up the good work! From the looks of the "usage agreement" that I have to check in order to make this review, this may well be my last review of anything! Have YOU read that agreement??? Holy Cow! expand » « collapse

It seems to function if I manage to hit the right areas on the totally black screen, but it's very irritating since it wasn't even a refurbished model.
I've tried to call, but the line has been busy, but I will keep trying to get hold of them and see what the customer service is like.
I have no complaints about the actual printing, it's crisp and fast and I do like using it except that I can't see what the heck buttons I'm pushing.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent small printer for the price.
Item.Review: Excellent small printer for the price. I use a larger Epson printer for photos and ADF scanning, but needed a small wireless printer that could also scan and copy. The wireless setup was easy; the print quality is fine, (I mostly print to PDF files anyway!) and found that I could even print remotely from phone and email . . . a bonus feature. This is just a lightweight personal printer, but that's exactly what I wanted to fit on a small cart in a tight space. Happy with the purchase.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Good features. Good wireless connectivity.
Cons: Build quality is poor.
At the price, you can't go wrong, especially when on sale for $60. At least, so I thought. This model had features comparable to many of the other $100 and $150-range printers. My understanding is that cost per page is also cheap on the ink side.
On opening the box, my initial reaction was at how lightweight and fairly insubstantial the product felt. We have had both a Canon and HP printer prior to this. Both felt much more solidly built. Apparently, my initial reaction was a wise one - as of yesterday, 30 days after purchase, the scanner, which has been used possibly four times, has died. Epson has offered a new replacement, however as a premier silver member, I'm given 45 days at Best Buy. ... Will be visiting tonight to return this printer and buy a Canon.
Setup was a little tricky - it did not immediately pick up an IP address for printing, but after a couple resets of the printer, we were in business. Our experience with a comparable HP was bad. Though build quality was good, the HP continually lost the connection to the wireless network. This model of Epson never had that issue. My iPhone and iPad found the printer flawlessly.
All this is good, but of little use when you can't get the scanner to scan or can't get the printer to print. I'm not very confident that the printer side of this device will do any better than the scanner. Spend another $50 and buy a Canon in the $150 range. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice size to travel with; Reliable; Quality Construction; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Slow higher quality
I love the size of this printer. It does all I need and is easier to travel with than my NX200 all in one. It also fits in my studio better, too. I am a textile artist and won't use anything but the DuraBright inks for printing on fabrics, cards or photo paper. The only thing that is a little annoying is that this model seems to print slower at higher quality settings than my NX200, but the photo quality is wonderful (the only reason for just 4 stars is the print speed). I still have my NX200 and a Workforce 1100, and at times have had all three printing various projects at the same time....

I bought this to replace an Epson Stylus 760 that was so old I had forgotten when I bought it. The NX-430 looks like it will be as good a choice as the 760. The paper feed is a simple back-to front with no major bends, and seems quite reliable. The new (to me) wireless capability is easy to use. I think I will like the separate cartridges for each ink color; the main beef I had about my 760 was that I figured I was throwing away ink every time I had to replace the three-color cartridge. The scanner is simple enough my wife uses it without calling me. A fax would have been a handy addition, but we wanted decent photo quality, and the Workforce printers (which had the fax) were not recommended for photo ... s. All in all, we have been very happy with it so far. It will be a long time, though, before I can tell you if it's as durable as a 760. expand » « collapse

I already loved the Epson brand. So when I needed to purchase another printer, I went right to Epson. This model is compact and very easy to use and was so simple to install on my computer.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Good for envelopes; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
Very good little printer, especially for the price. I needed a replacement printer while traveling for an emergency. I needed to run a lot of #10 envelopes through it and it worked like a charm, and the scanner is faster than I expected. The wireless capability was something else I hadn't expected to be able to get in its price range.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy to Use; Efficient; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up
Great printer. Bought for school use and was simple to setup and is an amazing printer.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quite; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Reliable; Small foot print; Good Value
Cons: None
I have bought Epson for years. I don't care what Consumer Reports may say. I like em !!!!! Got mine on sale for less then the cost to buy replacement ink for my old Epson all in one.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use; Quality Construction
Finding a good balance between price and quality it's always hard. This printer offers all the features you would expect from a modern printer without the high price. It's perfect for everyday use. Speed and printing quality are good overall.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Efficient; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
Great printer - two sided printer works great. Great product, but Staples didn't make it easy to buy ! Your price match process is very hard to use . Maybe your associate couldn't find there EASY BUTTON !!!

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I have to admit I have not used it much, since it is in a second home, and it is a bit slow if you are going to use it for office use, and you are not patient or deal with a high volume. It was a simple wireless setup, and the quality is good. Because it is occasional use only, I cannot vouch for long term durability at this time. The price was excellent!

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Printer - bad instructions for Google Print
Item.Review: This printer was just what I needed. Small, cheap, wireless and utilized Google Cloud Print so that I could print from anywhere (I would be using it to print from work and from my Android phone). Wireless printing (local) was easy to setup but Google Cloud Print capability took some time to figure out. Although this is certified Google Cloud Print printer that supposedly needed no extra software, there were no instructions on Epson's website or in its manual on how to set it up. I had to install everything on the included driver/software CD to get it to work...I hate installing all of the manufacturers programs since they are bloated and unnecessary-I usually only install the driver. After I got that to work, I have had no issues with the printer! I only print documents with this printer a ... nd so far it has printed those great. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use; Wireless; Fast Operation; Reliable; Network ready; Easy To Set Up; Quiet
Purchased it for my home office. It's a quick print, compact design and the printing quality for documents, posters/flyers , charts and graphs is really good. It's not wonderful for photo printing, but it does a decent job (far better than some of my previous "photo" printers). Printer cartridges are not super expensive either, which was the draw for me, not having to spend so much on ink.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Slow Operation; Noisy
Easy set up including wireless operation. Very good print quality. Copy function is very slow to process each page. Printer is generally noisy during operation, but for [$] delivered to my house, I can easily deal with the few cons.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality
Bought this for daughter and she loves it. Easy setup and easy to use. I would highly recommend this product to anyone that needs a printer for use at home.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy iPad connection; Easy WiFi connection; Easy Android connection; Easy To Use; Easy iPhone connection; Great Print Quality
Cons: Slow Operation
I bought this printer for [$] at the Feasterville, PA store. A great buy! I bought it primarily so I could print pictures from my iPhone. I wasn't expecting much for [$]. I was quite surprised at the ease of use and great photo print quality. I went right back to Staples and stocked up on ink and photo paper. There is a nice little app from Epson that lets you manage the printing from the iPhone. You can download it from apps. I also downloaded it from Market for the Android and it works just as well. Now my kids, wife and friends all come to my house and run me out of papaer. Great. I told them to go and buy ... their own Epson's for [$]. It's a little slow but the tradeoff is superior photo print quality. It's worth the wait. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Quiet
Cons: Slow Operation; Hard Setup
Could not get it downloaded on my computer which is windows 7. Had to have my computer guy come and do it because I kept getting a message that said scanner drivers not found. I don't think my next printer will be an Epson. Find that the ink for them is just too expensive.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Value and ease of set up
Followed included instructions and printer found wifi network with its wizard. According to intstructions, all computers need to have software install to connect to printer. However, using Pages from iPad the printer was viewable directly from the print option in Pages. No software installation needed for iPad. So, very easy set up and printing from iPad is a snap. Would recommend this printer at this point but I can't yet speak to reliability as I've only had the printer a few days.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Compact design and easy to use
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Quiet
Like compact size in our trailer, easy to setup and use. Like separate color cartridges so you can replace what you need (#124's for moderate yield print/#126's for high yield). Control panel Setup Function also allows you to see ink level so you know when to replace ink. Staples Rewards offers rebates on empty recycled cartridges too (saves on ink costs). Very nice printer!

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Quiet; Compact Design
My husband and I love the Epson Small-In-One! We were seeking out a wireless printer for general home office use and the Epson Stylus NX430 was perfect for our needs. I love that a machine that is this compact does its job so well: the interface is easy to operate, the print quality is satisfactory. The wireless set-up was no hassle; we have both our computers as well as his smartphone set up with the printer. The scanner is a flatbed (hence no auto-feed option). Since we don't do any large volume of scanning this isn't problematic for us.
Just a general note: this printer has separate ink cartridges (black, cyan, yellow, magenta). Replacement cartridges seemed rea ... sonable but understandably were cheaper if you bought all the color cartridges together as a pack versus individually. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact, allows us to print from two computers
Cons: Somewhat Incompatabe with Paperport wirelessly
I was looking to replace my Epson Photo printer with a compact wireless All In One that would fit in a small cabinet . All of the six color system units were too big. I decided to keep my Photo printer just for photos and get an inexpensive All in One to use mainly for B & W printing. This little guy fits the bill perfectly. The only hang up (minor) is the scanner doesn't work exactly the way I'd like. I use Paperport for scanning and the wireless network connection requires too much preliminary steps to scan to the right Paperport folder. Since I don't scan stuff every day, I just plug in a long USB cable when I need to scan and it works perfectly. Great little All i ... n One for the money. Also, it is soooo easy to set up. Got it up and running wirelessly on two computers in a flash! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This all in one works very well. Color prints come out very good but it is a bit slow and noisy. Regular prints come out fast. Scans work well though with a mac there is now way to make multiple scans save as one document. Overall I would recommend this all in one as a great value for the price.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Noisy; Slow Operation
The design of the printer is odd. The paper bends over in the printer causing paper jams. Very slow to print. Doesn't receive a signal very well from wireless print order.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality; Easy To Use
It's small but does the job. So far it has been very reliable, but I've only had it for a month.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Slow Operation
I am totaly happy with this printer. The set up on my Mac was easy & connecting my iPhone's was simple. It has great wifi range. I would recomend to all my friends.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: price, individual print cartridges, wireless
Cons: card reader wont work wirelessly
Very nice printer/scanner. Setup was a breeze, had it wireless via my IMAC under 10 minutes from unpacking. The install software was the best I've seen. Replaced my HP that I had for about 3 years and this one is a little bit smaller and the features are the same except for the wireless that works flawlessly. The one feature I did loose was the card reader, even though you can print from your SD card, you can't download the images to your computer via the printer (not that I can figure out anyway, no manual came with my printer). Not a big deal, card readers are cheap. I also like the individual color supplies, no need to replace a tri-color cartridge just because you run out of 1 ... color. I highly recommend this printer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Reliable; Easy To Use; Quiet; Compact Design
This little item is a gem. Fast, easy to use and set up, quiet, what more can I say? I recommend this to anyone who needs a printer for personal use or the next college student. It should satisfy you needs beautifully.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, Wireless
Cons: N/A
Bought it on sale spur of the moment because my old printer quite on me and i needed to print term papers pronto! This little gem is pretty fast, easy to set-up, wireless feature is awesome so no more cables! Although it could have been a little cheaper it is definitely worth the price for sure!

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Quiet; Fast Operation; Reliable
This is a very nice easy to use printer. No problems so far.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up; Compact Design; So far better than my HP; Great Print Quality; Quiet
Pleased with the easy set-up. So far, it has been reliable. Hope that it last longer than my HP photosmart which only lasted about w years!!

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Quiet; Compact Design
Cons: Slow Operation
Love the detailed color printing! Didnot like that I couldnt put documents in top paper feeder for scanning multiple documents at one time.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Fits Where I Needed It to Fit
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Slow Operation; Noisy
I picked this printer because it is a small all-in-one. It fits perfectly in the space I have. It works fine, print quality is good, set up was easy. Cons--it's a little noisy and fairly slow. I don't mind as I am using this at home for just personal stuff. I normally only print a few pages at a time.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Absolutely delighted with the price point and reliability of recently purchased NX430 all-in-one. It's high quality is excellent and I'm delighted with it's Network capability.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: good little printer, touch screen is a nice touch, so is the colour lcd display. was easy to unpack, set up, and start using right off the bat. also did automatic update and install. very good.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Small, easy to install, does it all
I've had this printer for a few months now and am very happy with it. As long as you follow the instructions it is easy to install this wireless printer/scanner/copier. It fits perfectly into our new cabinet so we don't have to see it all the time.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality; Excellent easy to use; Compact Design; Fast Operation; Reliable; Easy To Use
Cons: None
No muss no fuss,bought this for a client who found his HP printer difficult to use and alwasys had problems. Clients words eactly: "Thank you, I just wanted a printer that works and is easy to use"

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: It's wireless! Awesome
Cons: Nothing so far
Wanted a different printer so I picked this one up. I REALLY like that it is wireless, takes up very little space, and it has seperate cartridges for ink colors.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I love this printer...and it was super easy to install and connect to my wireless network. Only downfall is that the USB cord is not included in the package. Now I have to go buy one just to scan a photo but it was well worth it. Now I will be able to print from my iPhone :) A+++++++

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Fast Operation; Print from iPhone
Wanted something that my daughters could use to print from their iPads for school, wirelessly. Awesome printer, and great price!!

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this printer as a replacement for my ancient Lexmark printer that was soo old they didn't even make the software to connect it to my macbook (I even called & spoke w/ a rep). After putting together my budget I researched a few sites and found best buy had the best price for my printer, copier, scanner needs (I don't use fax). I was informed by my sister that 'hp' has the worst customer service and overall breaks easily so I looked toward Epson. All in all this 3in1 meets my needs, I do not need speed & this printer is not so fast. The pages come out very high quality and I can do everything from the touchscreen, even change settings & checking ink levels. The ink comes in 3-packs for color, single for black and it does not waste soo easily, I did replace my black ink f ... irst due to my being a student & printing essays & such for school. If you need a simple but durable average speed printer, this is what I would recommend. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Prints well, scanning is a slow process (wireless)
Item.Review:
Pros: The price, wireless
Cons: The scanning
Overall satisfied with this product for the price. Scanning process could be faster, but not sure if that is because of wireless network connection. Good for basic home office use.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Quiet; Reliable; Compact Design
Not a computer geek so I had Staples Tech connect to my computer and it is a good replacement for my 5-year old printer that was no longer serviceable.
For the price, it is a good fit for me as I use it for printing from Internet and copies of documents I may need.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact, excellent value, good quality
Cons: Wireless setup tricky unless configured initially through USB
Exactly what I wanted - a small, inexpensive, general-purpose printer. My wife has a high-end photo printer. I have a laser printer for documents. We needed a printer that could do whatever we threw at it, and with reasonable quality. The quality is better than we expected. A nice plus is that it will even print my personal checks (2.75"x6"). I had a workhorse Epson for years, but it didn't survive my move several years ago. I tried other manufacturers since then, and I'm pleased that Epson quality, value, and versatility is still what I remembered.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One™ All-in-One Printer
Item.Review: I purchased this printer for use with my iPad. Not being great technically and never having much luck setting up anything without tech support, I was really surprised. It was effortless and took me all of 5 minutes. For such an inexpensive printer it does all that I need.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use, easy to set up
We bought this for my wife to print work documents at home. Set up was easy - with both a PC and a Mac. It prints quickly and with great quality. Highly recommended.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality; Quiet; Fast Operation
Cons: Will not work wireless
Disappointed that it would not work in the wireless format. Print quality very good.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Compact Design; Quiet; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality
Cons: Flimsy Construction; Flimsy Paper Tray
The first one I bought broke after 5 weeks. Screen showed a permanent paper jam. Because the printer was over 30 days old Epson sent me a refurbished printer instead of a new one but I received it in 2 days. The NX 430 is just what it is supposed to be for the money: an inexpensive personal printer. However the print quality is very good and I like the individual color ink cartridges which is why I have purchased Epsons for many years. It is very compact but the construction is somewhat flimsy so it's a compromise. Overall I'm happy with the NX430. I print a wide range of paper and label types with it, including photos, and it does a good job. B ... uy it when it's on sale because it's not worth the list price. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Its easy to set up with the wifi and its fast
This printer is great. Its easy to set up with the wifi and it prints out my documents fast. And easy to use.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Compact Design; Great Print Quality; Reliable; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Noisy
A little noisy at the start of the print job but otherwise a great printer at a great price. Very easy to set up & network w/other computers in the home.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up. Prints quickly once it starts.
Cons: Takes longer to start up but then it is fine
I had hoped to print cardstock. I find that it will not print the heavier cardstock. Other than that, I love it. I had really struggled with my old Epson(just worn out) so this is a pleasure.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, great price, print/scan/copy quality and speed
Cons: Ink prices
I picked the Epson Small-in-one because of my past great experiences with Epson, its compact size and it's low price. I use it mostly for college and record keeping (scanning and copying).
It was fast with set up (not to mention simple), sending, responding, and printer jobs; the quality of the scans, copies, and prints is so good.
The ink is a little high for my tastes (I'm cheap) but it lasts a long time.
Overall, I think that this printer is good for students and families alike. It's very easy to use, wire free, and fast.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Features I wanted at a great price
Cons: Nothing is "not so great"
I had an All-In-One Printer from another manufacturer - a much more expensive one. It was especially slow in getting ready to print photos and was very noisy. It finally gave up the ghost and I was ready to look for an alternative. I found the Epsom Stylus All-In-one printer and it looked as if it would suit me just fine. My other printer was very large - the Epsom was much smaller and did everything I wanted it to do quietly and quickly.
It is perfect for me.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Quick and easy setup. Its great having a wireless printer that can print/scan/etc... Now it doesn't matter where my laptop, desktop, phone, or tablet is as long as I'm on my home network. Downloaded the Android app that is handy when I'm on my tablet and need to print something.
When I made the purchase I just searched for the least expensive WiFi printers with tons positive reviews and this was at the top of my list (I think there was maybe one other printer that I considered). Bought this one because the reviews, was on sale, and had an android app.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: easy for the occasional user.
Cons: sometimes it takes some time to print when its wireless (1 minute)
Got a pretty good black Friday deal. This printer works pretty great so far. Wireless set up was easy. 99% of the time I am printing wireless. I've had a few months with no issues. I print coupons etc occasioanlly and so far so good. Havent had to change the ink yet.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this for school type reasons for my brother, sister, and me. It works very well and for the price it is a good buy. It is small and it doesn't take a lot of space.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Easy To Use
Cons: Slow Operation
This is a good little machine, for me it has what i want, have not used it much as of yet. Been buzy and will need to figure out how to use some of the features. Cant beat this price, i think it is the lowest around. Good luck to future consumers.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: prints well. Wireless works.
Cons: limited information when you need to troubleshoot the connection
This printer puts out quality printing and I love that it is wireless. However, I had some problems with setting up the wireless access. Press a few buttons and it should be working but it didn't and said it couldn't get a signal. However, my laptop in the other room could receive a signal. Finally, I put the wireless router above the printer and it worked.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I love this printer. It can print from the web, or from google chrome or from iPhone. It has a 20 image index print setting perfect for referencing photos. It's nicely built and the touch screen is nice. Also light on ink. Cheap ink too.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Compact Design
Cons: Noisy
Works very well with my Mac Pro, and was very easy to set up. The only thing that kept it from getting five stars was that it is a bit noisy, but that is not a big issue to me. The size is great also.

Item.Item: Epson Stylus NX430 Small-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Works like a charm & doed the job !
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality
This works great after I had to deep 6 my HP Deskjet printer after 10 years. So let's see how long this puppy lasts.
